page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our block covers a mainly rural area on a ridge between the towns of Penistone and Stocksbridge. However,some large industrial concerns are found in our block. These are,the Conoco Oil Terminal, Fox's Wire Ltd. part of British Steel's Stocksbridge Works, and British telecoms Hunshelf mast,which is being built. Our school is just out of our block as is most of the village. Although the area is mainly rural, the industrial concerns are very important economically. Many of the peolpe who live in our area work in the towns of{SOUTH YORKSHIRE.}The space of the {PEAK DISTRICT}is as close as the amenities of {SHEFFIELD {AND BARNSLEY.}
